general.name: Name
general.donation_text: Your donation keeps the lunch.community alive!

orderset.subtitle_1: {{name}} is taking orders for {{location}} today. Click here for the
orderset.subtitle_2: If you'd like to have something from that place, put it into the text field below.
orderset.order_finished: Ordering has been closed. As soon as the food arrives,

create.welcome_subtitle_1: Get together with your co-workers for lunch.
create.welcome_subtitle_2: Stop the tiresome day-to-day discussions about what and where. No more eating alone. No more missing out on a lunch. No more being hungry.
create.create_community_subtitle: Create the lunch community for your team or organization here. Then, share the link to your community with your co-workers and friends.

main.welcome_text_1: please choose your favorite food places for today. You can select one or more places - anything you are in the mood for.
main.welcome_text_2: If you feel like ordering or picking up food for you and your co-workers from one of the places, please press
main.welcome_text_4: Otherwise, just wait until someone else presses the button and then you can join in.
main.hint_1: Note: You never need to reload this website and anything you click or type will be immediately visible to your community
main.hint_2: without pressing the Enter button (except when sending out chat messages).
main.community_new: This community seems to be newly-created.
main.invite_colleagues_1: Please invite your co-workers and friends to this lunch community by clicking the share symbol
main.invite_colleagues_2: in the topbar. The link to this community will be copied to your clipboard and contains a secret unique ID to this community.
main.invite_colleagues_3: Please make sure to share the link only with people from your team or your local organization to avoid
main.invite_colleagues_5: Please add places to your community to get going. Press the '+' symbol below to add a new place.

welcome.welcome_new_user: You are new here. Please enter your name so your co-workers know who you are.
welcome.hint_1: Note: Your name is not stored on our servers. It is only stored in your current browser instance and it is used
welcome.hint_2: to identify your orders. Usually your first name should be sufficient, but since the name is also used as an
welcome.hint_3: identification for your person, your should make sure it is unique within your community.

about.company_name: My EV Ride GbR - Thorsten Liese und Daniel Siedentopf
